text: Fahmi Reza (born 7 June 1977) is a Malaysian political graphic designer, street artist, and documentary filmmaker. He is famous for drawing then-Prime Minister Najib Razak as a clown. Fahmi also makes satirical art of other Malaysian politicians, many of whom are accused of corruption. He has been arrested several times for his work. ==References == Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Malaysian artists Category:Filmmakers
title: Fahmi Reza
